data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Gyeongsangnam-do, South Korea be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gyeongsangnam-do, South Korea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Gyeongsangnam-do.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 459,564 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, we pray that the state of Gyeongsangnam-do be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Gyeongsangnam-do to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Gyeongsangnam-do, South Korea.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Gyeongsangnam-do, South Korea to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Gyeongsangnam-do
location.people_groups_list: Thai, Malay, Uzbek, Northern, Japanese, Kazakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Thai (102,000), Malay (9,600), Uzbek, Northern (55,000), Japanese (52,000), Kazakh (12,000)
